name: Mr.3 (Galdino)
text: On Play: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck and reveal up to 1 card with the (Cross Guild) type or with a type including "Baroque Works", other than "Mr 3 - Galdino" and put it into your hand. Then place the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck and reveal up to 1 card with the (Cross Guild) type or with a type including "Baroque Works", other than "Mr 3 - Galdino" and put it into your hand. Then place the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.
